Package camzup.core

Interface ICurve

All Superinterfaces:
IEntityData, IUtils
All Known Implementing Classes:
Curve, Curve2, Curve3
public interface ICurve extends IEntityData
Maintains consistent behavior for curves of different dimensions.

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final float
    KAPPA
    Magnitude for orthogonal handles when four curve knots are used to approximate an ellipse or circle (90 degrees per knot), 0.5522850155830383f .

    Magnitude for orthogonal handles when four curve knots are used to approximate an ellipse or circle (90 degrees per knot), 0.5522847498307936 .
    static final int
    KNOT_CAPACITY
    Default number of knots to expect when creating an array list in curves.
    static final int
    KNOTS_PER_CIRCLE
    Default number of cubic Bezier knots used to approximate a circle.

  • Field Details

    • KAPPA

      static final float KAPPA
      Magnitude for orthogonal handles when four curve knots are used to approximate an ellipse or circle (90 degrees per knot), 0.5522850155830383f . Derived from (Math.sqrt(2.0) - 1.0) * 4.0 / 3.0.
